PropertySetConfig.expression: IF(%PerformAction:Action% = "Record Decision", "GPMS_Decision_PA", IF(%PerformAction:Action% = "Record Request for Reconsideration", "GPMS_Request_for_Reconsideration_PA", IF(%PerformAction:Action% = "Record a Decision on Request for Reconsideration", "GPMS_Decision_on_Request_for_Reconsideration_PA", IF(%PerformAction:Action% = "Record Request for Reconsideration by the AAT", "GPMS_Request_for_Reconsideration_by_the_AAT_PA", IF(%PerformAction:Action% = "Record AAT Decision", "GPMS_AAT_Decision_PA", IF(%PerformAction:Action% = "Cancel", "GPMS_Cancel_PA", IF(%PerformAction:Action% = "Change Variation Day", "GPMS_Change_Variation_Day_PA", "")))))))
PropertySetConfig.label: RecordType
